message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to your business. I'm happy to offer it to you for $1,000,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer. I agree this product would be valuable, but that price is a bit high for my budget.  Could we work something out closer to $700,000?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I recognize your budget considerations, the value this product brings is substantial. How about we meet in the middle at $900,000?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to move on the price.  To be frank, I have another offer for $800,000. If you can come down to that, I'm ready to close the deal today.  Otherwise, I'll have to seriously consider the other offer.
